children.desc: This service is delivery using blind van car transportation.
children.desc2: This service is a delivery using CDE truck transportation while being able to deliver packages / goods with a maximum weight of 2 tons, with a box size of : 340 x 180 x 190 cm. With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.
children.desc3: This service is delivery using CDD truck transportation while being able to deliver packages/goods with a maximum weight of 4 tons, with a box size of : 435 x 200 x 200 cm (17 cbm). With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.
children.desc4: This service is a delivery using CDD Cold Chain truck transportation while being able to deliver packages/goods with a maximum weight of 4 tons. With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.
children.desc5: This service is delivery using Fuso truck transportation as well as being able to deliver packages/goods with a maximum weight of 8 tons, with Box size: 650 x 220 x 240 cm (30 cbm). With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.
children.desc6: This service is a delivery using Fuso Cold Chain truck transportation while being able to deliver packages/goods with a maximum weight of 9 tons. With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.
children.desc7: This service is delivery using wingbox truck transportation while being able to deliver packages/goods with a maximum weight of 15 tons, with Box size: 720 x 250 x 250 cm (45 cbm). With destination coverage to the islands of Sumatra (apart from bangka belitung, batam, and tanjung pinang), Java, and West Nusa Tenggara.

childrenTwo.title: The lead time of trucking services varies greatly according to destination, and PT Sarana Mulya Logistik focuses on providing the best lead time at competitive prices.
childrenTwo.title2: The trucking services that PT Sarana Mulya Logistik provides include proof of delivery (POD) returns with a standard POD return time between 7 to 14 days (unless there is a special request for acceleration).
childrenTwo.title3: At the same time serving FTL (Full Trucking Load) and FCL (Less Trucking Load).

bold.text5: related to PT Sarana Mulya Logistik's trucking services which include:
